description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. An evil queen needs a BLT bad but has no bacon!  Batter that pig for maximum tenderness and extract all the bacon possible from the great BBQs.  Use the piggy's natural boost and steer it to ultimate bloody bacon glory!
description.short: An evil queen needs a BLT bad but has no bacon!  Batter that pig for maximum tenderness and extract all the bacon possible from the great BBQs.  Use the piggy's natural boost and steer it to ultimate bloody bacon glory!
